text.section:
A person may not pay a fine or cost imposed by a court by delivering a check issued by the person or another person if:
the person knows that payment of the check has not been provided for; and
payment of the check is refused by the drawee on presentment.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 60 days or a fine not exceeding $100 or both.
